author: Ken Meyer
title: GOP Congressman Says the Republican Party is in ‘Troubled Waters’ Thanks to the Marjorie Taylor Greene ‘Element’

sentence: ‘Lauren Boebert, and Marjorie Taylor Green, and Paul Gosar, is that a different element than you’ve ever seen before?’ host Chuck Todd asked.
author: Jim Hoft
title: Dirtbag RINO Fred Upton Goes on Meet the Press and Says Republican Party Is in “Troubled Waters” Because of Marjorie Taylor Greene and Lauren Boebert (VIDEO)

sentence: Host Chuck Todd posed the question, “Lauren Boebert, and Marjorie Taylor Green, and Paul Gosar, is that a different element than you’ve ever seen before?” Upton replied, “I don’t think we’ve had as many folks in that sort of wing of the party elected as we have before, but I think they’re very popular back at home.” Todd then pressed Upton to explain his answer further.
author: DML News App
title: VIDEO: GOP Rep. who voted to impeach Trump warns party in ‘troubled waters’
